title: Snap Some Memories!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Kanata-san, look. There are pictures of us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh, wow~! There are so many!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It looks like they’re holding an exhibition here......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It looks like we’ve become the representative school idols of Odaiba~ ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Seems like that’s the case...... Rina-chan Board says, “Stare~.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Let’s take a picture and show everyone else.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Sure. I want to go buy the souvenir cat cake afterward.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ahaha, it sure smells good~ Kanata-chan wants to eat it too! Let’s go buy it ♪ But first, let’s take a picture~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Kanata-san, I want to take a selfie with you in front of the entire exhibit. Is that okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course, of course~! Let’s take lots of pictures!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
